name: Cubedodger
description:
Cubedodger is a free minigame where you control a cube and your objective is to survive waves of spheres. You can play solo or with a friend on the same keyboard.

This is the first game I programmed almost entirely by myself. I'm learning programming and I'm pretty happy with this first project.

  • Play solo or with a friend on the same keyboard
  • Powerups to help you survive
    • Clock: Slow down time to give you a break, but careful, you'll be slowed down too.
    • Bomb: Clear all spheres on the screen.
  • Chiptune music.
  • Different types of spheres.
  • Download the game or play directly on your browser
  • ALT+ENTER to play fullscreen.
  • Resolution limited to 1024x768.

Patch 1.0.1

- The interface on the Web version now properly scales. (still not perfect tho)

- The "squish" button has been changed from shift to control, to avoid "StickyKeys" problems.

- When you die on SOLO mode the message shown is the correct one.

- The Splash Screen image now shows up.

More games:

  • Snail Simulator 2015
  • Snail Simulator 2019 Beta
  • Eladio: Beyond Meteorito
